title: Capitol Hill Parks: Park Home
body: The Parks of Capitol Hill  The Capitol Hill Parks include several park areas east of the U.S. Capitol. Included in this group are Folger, Lincoln, Stanton, and Marion Parks, the Eastern Market and Potomac Avenue Metro stations, and several smaller land parcels such as Seward Square, Twining Square, the Maryland Avenue Triangles, the Pennsylvania Avenue Medians, and 59 inner-city triangles and squares.              Your Neighborhood Parks   Walk, run, bike, learn, explore, AND have fun!
